segments.text: I see the woman’s concentration as she holds that plate, completely oblivious to the water flooding around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There is a sense of comfort in her routine, but it's tainted by the dangers that lurk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to something sneaky and I’m left feeling uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel my heart racing as I imagine what will happen if the boy falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to spill, soaking the cabinets, and I cringe at the thought of the damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a juxtaposition of calm and chaos, and it leaves me unsettled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think we often overlook the small disasters happening right under our noses.
segments.speaker: PAR
